s2.ptxt: Install the 2 license plate light bulbs to the license plate light assembly.
Install the license plate light assembly while turning it as shown in the illustration.
Attach the 2 claws to the license plate light assembly.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL LICENSE PLATE LIGHT LENS GASKET

s2.ptxt: Install 2 new license plate light lens gaskets.
Install the 2 license plate light lenses with the 4 screws.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL BACK DOOR FRAME MOULDING LH (except Standard)

atten4.ptxt: When installing the back door frame moulding LH, heat the back door outside garnish and back door frame moulding LH using a heat light.

atten3.ptxt: Do not heat the back door outside garnish or back door frame moulding LH excessively.

s2.ptxt: Clean the back door outside garnish surface.

s3.ptxt: Using a heat light, heat the back door outside garnish surface.
Remove the double-sided tape from the back door outside garnish surface.
Wipe off any tape adhesive residue with cleaner.

s2.ptxt: Install a new back door frame moulding LH.

s3.ptxt: Using a heat light, heat a new back door frame moulding LH and the back door outside garnish surface.
Remove the peeling paper from the face of the back door frame moulding LH.

atten4.ptxt: After removing the peeling paper, keep the exposed adhesive free from foreign matter.

s3.ptxt: Install the back door frame moulding LH to the back door outside garnish using double-sided tape.

atten4.ptxt: Press the back door frame moulding LH firmly to install it.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL BACK DOOR FRAME MOULDING RH (except Standard)

atten4.ptxt: Use the same procedure described for the LH side.

s2.ptxt: Install the back door outside handle with the 2 nuts.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL BACK DOOR TRIM BOARD ASSEMBLY

s2.ptxt: Attach the 16 clips to install the back door trim board.
